Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures but difficult for me to hold
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: pros-Takes excellent pictures, zoom is great and there are plenty of user options in the menus to cover a lot of different lighting situationscons-1) The camera case that came with my package was too small for the camera to fit into.  I had go go and buy another case and that resulted in more $$.  I notice that in another review, the case was way too large.2)  The camera is not easy for me to hold.  First it is quite awkward to hold with only my right hand.  Yes, there is a small grip bar on the front of the camera that helps a bit, but with its rounded body and smooth surface, I am unable to get a comfortable and secure hold with only one hand.  Second, if I use two hands in holding the camera, I normally put the thumb of my left hand under the camera and the index finger of my left hand on the top of the camera toward the left side.  In this situation, my index finger is right on top of the flash, so when the flash automatically opens, my finger is right on top of it .  Not good.  This may not be a problem for other people, but it is bothersome to me.

Reviews.Title: Again canon
Reviews.Author: Ban Colman
Reviews.Content: I order this for my friend who gave me a challenge if i can get for him something great and pocket size.He was shocked when he got it.

Reviews.Title: great package
Reviews.Author: rb
Reviews.Content: great package for the money. the little flexible tripod was super for my road trip. compact, easy to use, nice pics and good zooming abilities. the 16g card did not even get full after 1300+ photos and the batteries lasted the entire day most of the time. in addition, the carrying case is light, roomy, and convenient for our moderate hikes.

Reviews.Title: Check package
Reviews.Author: Prabhu Narayanasamy
Reviews.Content: I have received the package 2 days back. But just today as i checked i noticed for the missing card reader and memory card wallet. So its important to check that all your supposed to get are rightly received. And regarding the camera its worth for the dollars spent,though it is not that efficient for fast clicks as it takes minimum 5second to resume the last click.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Twelves
Reviews.Content: Have had this camera for about 6 weeks, so far it's amazing. As a family with young children and no time for an SLR, this is the next best thing. The only weird thing is the placement of the flash, it does hit my finger.. but I am used to it now.

Reviews.Title: Carrying Case Too Big
Reviews.Author: sepehr
Reviews.Content: Overall it is a good deal and a good camera, but when they sell a case with a camera, you would expect it to be made for the camera, not just a random case large enough to fit the camera. This case is too large.
